attributes.action: Government serve the people not the people serve government
attributes.additional_details: We the signed have contacted the government through the correct chain of procedure and have been blatantly ignored with complete disregard to our emotions and views that are entitled to us as free human beings. We the signed request that it be mandatory for MPs and PMs to fulfill their duty to serve the British people, listen when requested and have the common decency to reply to the people that pay their wages. We have the power as people to refuse to work if the government refuse to listen.
